post.ajax.php

00001 <?php
00002 require "../config.php";
00003 require "ajax.class.php";
00004 
00005 /**
00006  * All ajax functions relating to posts.
00007  *
00008  * @author Ryan LeFevre
00009  * @see OsimoAjax
00010  */
00011 class OsimoAjaxPost extends OsimoAjax{
00012 
00013  /**
00014   * Class constructor.
00015   * Ajax triggers are set here.
00016   */
00017  function OsimoAjaxPost() {
00018   parent::OsimoAjax();
00019   $this->register(
00020    array(
00021     "submitPost"=>"submit_post"
00022    )
00023   );
00024  }
00025 
00026  /**
00027   * Creates a post that is submitted over ajax.
00028   */
00029  protected function submit_post() {
00030   if (!get('user')->is_logged_in()) {
00031    $this->json_error("You must be logged in to post!");
00032   }
00033   elseif (get('osimo')->POST['content'] == '') {
00034    $this->json_error("You cannot submit a blank post.");
00035   }
00036 
00037   $data = array(
00038    "thread"=>get('osimo')->POST['threadID'],
00039    "body"=>get('osimo')->POST['content'],
00040    "poster_id"=>get('user')->id
00041   );
00042 
00043   $result = get('osimo')->post($data)->create($post);
00044   if ($result) {
00045    $loc = $post->location();
00046    if (get('theme')->is_ajax_capable('thread')) {
00047     $html = get('data')->do_standard_loop('thread', $loc['thread'], $loc['page'], false);
00048     $pagination = get('theme')->pagination_numbers('thread', $loc['thread'], $loc['page']);
00049     $this->json_return(array("html"=>$html, "location"=>$loc, "pagination"=>$pagination));
00050    }
00051    else {
00052     $this->json_return(array("refresh"=>true, "location"=>$loc));
00053    }
00054   }
00055   else {
00056    $this->json_error("There was an error creating your post, please try again.");
00057   }
00058  }
00059 }
00060 
00061 /**
00062  * Class is automatically instantiated so that
00063  * the ajax triggers set up in the constructor can 
00064  * be set and the proper one chosen for the incoming
00065  * data over ajax.
00066  */
00067 new OsimoAjaxPost();
00068 ?>
